Classic Eyelashes

Classic Eyelashes are the most traditional form of eyelash extensions. We're talking a 1:1 ratio of one extension applied to one natural lash. This means we can only apply as many extensions as you have natural lashes. So, if you have sparse lashes and wish to fill out your lash line, classic eyelash extensions won't be the most suitable fit for you. You'll want to read on about Hybrid and Volume extensions.

How does it work

The eyelash extension will applied to each of your own eyelashes along the upper lashline. To create a natural look, we will help you choose the most suitable length, thickness and to suit your eye shape. We do our best by keeping our standards to the max by using only top leading brands, to give you the best look you can get.

How long does it usually last

When arriving to your appointment, we kindly ask to arrive between 10 - 15 minutes before your appointmen, this helps us keep up with our bookings and avoid clients waiting to be seen. The service itself will vary, but it could last up to two hours.


Once your Classic Eyelashes are done, you won't need to get them re done for the next 4 to 6 weeks, it will all depend on how you treat and look after them.
